casebody.data:
Matthew J. SHORTT, Individually and as Trustee of the Harry and Marilynne Revocable Family Trust, Appellant,
v.
FEDERAL NATIONAL MORTGAGE ASSOCIATION ("FANNIE MAE"), a Corporation Organized and Existing Under the Laws of the United States of America, Appellee. Case No. 5D16-3096 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District. Decision filed November 14, 2017
Rehearing Denied December 21, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

AFFIRMED.
